name: Ballypatrick Forest Trails - 0 Corratavey Glen Trail

ai.summary: A short, easy forest hike on Ballypatrick Forest Trails featuring the Corratavey Glen Trail. At 2.7 km, this loop is suitable for families and casual walkers seeking a quick woodland stroll in the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently rolling forest path with shaded sections. Well-maintained in most areas, but expect occasional roots, damp patches, and uneven sections near the glen; appropriate footwear recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths. Check daylight hours and weather before setting out. Bring water and a small first-aid kit. Inform someone of your route, and be cautious of wet leaves and uneven ground; watch for wildlife and other hikers.
recommended_gear: Fully charged phone with emergency contacts
ai.best_seasons: Year-round in the UK, with spring to autumn offering the most comfortable conditions; be mindful of winter mud or ice.

seo.title: Ballypatrick Forest Trails – Corratavey Glen Trail (2.7 km, Easy)
seo.meta_description: Discover the 2.7 km Corratavey Glen Trail in Ballypatrick Forest. An easy, family-friendly hike in the UK—perfect for beginners and quick woodland strolls.
seo.h1: Corratavey Glen Trail, Ballypatrick Forest Trails (2.7 km, Easy)
